channel.title: Storytelling on Orion Illovsky's Data Analysis Projects
channel.description: Recent content in Storytelling on Orion Illovsky's Data Analysis Projects

item.title: Data Dashboard and Storytelling with Tableau, Hospital Readmission Rates
item.description: Data Dashboard and Storytelling with Tableau: Hospital Readmission Rates Description This project involved developing an interactive Tableau dashboard to explore the impact of state population on hospital readmission rates. The goal was to create a compelling and accessible data visualization that would effectively communicate insights to executive leaders and inform decision-making.
